channel.title: New source that canowneasy gave me to put on here!
channel.description:
This server has had it's ups and downs. Reaching > 1000 players and going < 50. [b][u]THIS IS NOT YOUR STANDARD BATTLESCAPE/WINTERLOVE. IT'S NETWORKING IS REDONE IT CAN EASILY HOLD 2000 PLAYERS!![/u][/b] This HAS SQL. ;) [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/IX%20FINAL.rar][DOWNLOAD SERVER][/url] [url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/IX%20Pro%20Client.rar][DOWNLOAD CLIENT][/url]
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/compressed.gif[/img] [b]An ACTIVE Server[/b] Tired of seeing servers with 10 people online? Tired of training by yourself? Tired of playing servers with less population than your dog's IQ? InnovationX is proud to state we hold a solid 300+ players, with peaks reaching over 800! [i]First Time We Had 100 Players[/i] (It's like 5x as much as this now) [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/w000t.png[/img] [b]Average Players Online[/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/noice.png[/img] [b]Lots of pkers![/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/edgepking.png[/img] [img]http://[b]Minigames[/b] [ul][*]Clan Wars [*]NAZI Zombies [*]Warriors Guild [*]Zombie Hunt [*]Fight Caves (63 waves) [*]Fight Pits [*]Barrows [*]Pest Control [*]Assualt [*]Duel Arena[/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/commander.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/nazi.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/holy.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/clanwars.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/barrows.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/activepessst.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/much.png[/img] [b]Client-sided Highlights[/b] [ul][*]317 gameframe [*]Automatic client updates, with auto-downloading cache (also webclient available) [*]All godsword animations (sidewalk too) (also 562+ godsword swing) [*]Fixed whip animations (run, walk, attack) [*]Skillcape emotes (gfx/emote) [*]Turmoil emotes [*]Staff of Light emote [*]Toggable x10 hits ::x10 [*]Toggable new hp bars ::hpbar[/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/agsspec.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/skillcape.png[/img] [b]Bosses[/b] Not only are bosses fun to fight, but they drop rare crackers, when used on players you or the person used on may obtain an awesome rare! The crackers chance of drop is less then 1% for regular users, 2% for premium users, and 4% for extreme users! [ul][*]Sea Troll Queen [*]Zombie Commander [*]Chaos Elemental [*]King Black Dragon [*]Kalphite Queen [*]Supreme Daggonoth [*]Prime Daggonoth [*]Daggonoth Rex [*]Mother Daggonoth[/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/chaosele.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/kalphitequeen.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/seatrollqueen.png[/img] [b]Training Spots[/b] [ul][*]Rock Crabs [*]Daggonoths [*]Moss Giants [*]Taverly Dungeon [*]Slayer Tower [*]Elf Island [*]Mole Tunnels [*]Al-Karid Warriors [*][b]MUCH MORE![/b][/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/crabs.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/slayertower.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/mossgiant.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/dheffect.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/greendrags.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/ownedplz.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/rdrags.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/moletrain.png[/img] [b]Things to Note[/b] [ul][*][b]CONSTANT[/b] updates. At least 1 per day. [*]Full forum integration (ranks, ect.) [*]Completely lag free. [*]Finest fibre-optic lines in the United States. [*]Full highscores updated every 3 minutes.[/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/highscores.png[/img] [b]World-Class Hosting[/b] When we say world-class, we mean it. InnovationX is hosted off a dedicated physical server located in St. Louis, USA. St. Louis USA contains the most powerful internet infrastructure in the United States. We are proud to say we buy from [b][url=http://www.serverloft.com]Serverloft Dedicated Server Solutions[/url][/b]. [spoiler=Dedicated Server Specifications] * Fujitsu PRIMERGY RX200 with Intel D2786 Chipset * 2x Xeon E5520, 2x Quadcore (8 core) - Nehalem * 8 GB DDR3 DIMM-RAM * 2x 500 GB SATA II HDDs, 7.200rpm * RAID 1 * 10.000 GB data transfer * Server location in Atlanta, Georgia/USA [/spoiler] [b]Live Radio DJ[/b] We are now offering our own live radio stream with a professional DJ - Evan. We plays various genres that include rap, hip hop, rock, pop, electric, metal, jazz, and sometimes we play funny commercials like the WTF Blanket!?! commercial. [b]Live Support System[/b] When we say live support, we mean it. InnovationX has selected trusted members of the community to serve as [b]Live Support Operators[/b]. We always have [b]3[/b] [b]Live Support Operators[/b] online. Each [b]Live Support Operator[/b] has been chosen according to their time-zone and languages spoken. For example, when it is 3:00 AM in the United States, there will be Australian and Asian [b]Live Support Operators[/b] online, as across the earth it is 3:00 PM and many will need support. [b]MOST[/b] of our [b]Live Support Operators[/b] are fluent in more than 1 language, in fact some are so well, they speak [b]4 different languages[/b]! We currently use [b]LiveZilla FREE[/b] for our Live Support system. [b]Dedication To It's Best[/b] InnovationX is dedicated to serving customers, such as you. We want you to experience a new type of private server, one in which is a democracy. We don't do things without asking your opinion of it first. Nearly all of our updates have fair-polls that are open to the public. People can vote whether or not the update would enhance InnovationX. [b]ALL[/b] of our staff members are voted on by current staff members, keeping staff quality upright. [b]The Forums[/b] Here at InnovationX, we hate illegal affairs. Our [b]vBulletin[/b] forums are [b][u]PAID[/u][/b] as well as our themes. Here's a few facts: [spoiler=Show Facts][b]1)[/b] You cannot use any version of the software without a license. [b]2)[/b] You void all your warranty and support by using ANY version of the software other than the one you obtained via members area here. [b]3)[/b] You void all your warranty and support by editing the version of the software you downloaded via members area. [b]4)[/b] Nulled version have a lot of known security issues which I will not outline. By using them (which is illegal in 99% of the case), you open your forum, and everything associated with it up to hackers and malicious users. [b]5)[/b] Your host may close your account (this applies to dedicated/colocated servers in datacenters) when they notice you are housing illegal software using their bandwidth, even if you are rightfully licensed. [b]6)[/b] Jelsoft can, have been, and always will take appropriate legal actions against those using vBulletin illegally.[/spoiler] Our forums are [b]ACTIVE[/b]. Unlike other server's forums, when you post something, expect it to be answered in a few minutes, not a few weeks. Here at InnovationX we are proud to have one of the most active forums in RSPS. [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/amgforums.png[/img] [U][B][COLOR=Cyan]Premium Membership[/COLOR][/B][/U] Premium Membership costs only $5.50 and it will help the server greatly. It is a [B][U]one-time payment[/U][/B] and will never have to pay again. Here is what you get: [B]Server Benefits:[/B] [ul][*]Fishing and Cooking skills [*]Ability to wear 3rd age armor [*]Ability to wear Bandos armor [*]1.5x more than the normal experience of a player [*]2x the pest control points of a normal player [*].25x the zombie points as a normal player [*]Indian Chief Pet which cures you of poison [*]Pet Dragon which heals you [*]Personal banker to follow you around and you can access your bank through him [*]2x the chance to get a christmas cracker than a normal player [*]In-game premium sign [*]Premium Only Zone! [*]::explockon (You will no longer gain experience) [*]::explockoff (You will gain experience again)[/ul] [B]Forum Benefits:[/B] [ul][*]Special colored name [*]Exclusive premium+ forum [*]Higher quality support [*]Monthly name changes[/ul] [COLOR=DarkOrchid][U][B]Extreme Membership[/B][/U] [/COLOR] For those of you who want a bigger edge on the other players, you can purchase Extreme Membership for, the same as before, a [B][U]one-time payment[/U][/B] of $12.50. This will go a long way in helping us pay for our servers and add new content. Here is what you get. Remember, this is on top of everything premiums get (you get everything above, plus what is below): [B]Server Benefits:[/B] [ul][*]4x the chance to get a Christmas cracker drop from the Sea Troll Queen or King Black Dragon [*]4x the pest control points as a normal member [*].5x the zombie points of a normal player [*]2x the experience gained from [U]every[/U] skill than normal members [*]Access to using the Skeleton Mage Pet to help you train and kill NPC's [*]Different in-game premium sign[/ul] [B]Forum Benefits:[/B] [ul][*]Exclusive purple colored name [*]Bi-weekly name changes[/ul] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/followpets.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/petfight.png[/img] [b]Skills - We have them all![/b] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/agility.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/agility1.png[/img]

item.title: New source that canowneasy gave me to put on here!
item.dc:creator: @paymon paymon
item.description:
@paymon wrote:

This server has had it’s ups and downs. Reaching > 1000 players and going < 50.

THIS IS NOT YOUR STANDARD BATTLESCAPE/WINTERLOVE. IT’S NETWORKING IS REDONE IT CAN EASILY HOLD 2000 PLAYERS!!

This HAS SQL.

[DOWNLOAD SERVER]
[DOWNLOAD CLIENT]

[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/9098208/compressed.gif[/img]

An ACTIVE Server
Tired of seeing servers with 10 people online? Tired of training by yourself? Tired of playing servers with less population than your dog’s IQ? InnovationX is proud to state we hold a solid 300+ players, with peaks reaching over 800!

First Time We Had 100 Players (It’s like 5x as much as this now)

Average Players Online

Lots of pkers!

[img]http://Minigames

[ul][]Clan Wars
[]NAZI Zombies
[]Warriors Guild
[]Zombie Hunt
[]Fight Caves (63 waves)
[]Fight Pits
[]Barrows
[]Pest Control
[]Assualt
[]Duel Arena[/ul]







Client-sided Highlights

[ul][]317 gameframe
[]Automatic client updates, with auto-downloading cache (also webclient available)
[]All godsword animations (sidewalk too) (also 562+ godsword swing)
[]Fixed whip animations (run, walk, attack)
[]Skillcape emotes (gfx/emote)
[]Turmoil emotes
[]Staff of Light emote
[]Toggable x10 hits ::x10
[*]Toggable new hp bars ::hpbar[/ul]


Bosses

Not only are bosses fun to fight, but they drop rare crackers, when used on players you or the person used on may obtain an awesome rare!
The crackers chance of drop is less then 1% for regular users, 2% for premium users, and 4% for extreme users!

[ul][]Sea Troll Queen
[]Zombie Commander
[]Chaos Elemental
[]King Black Dragon
[]Kalphite Queen
[]Supreme Daggonoth
[]Prime Daggonoth
[]Daggonoth Rex
[*]Mother Daggonoth[/ul]



Training Spots

[ul][]Rock Crabs
[]Daggonoths
[]Moss Giants
[]Taverly Dungeon
[]Slayer Tower
[]Elf Island
[]Mole Tunnels
[]Al-Karid Warriors
[*]MUCH MORE![/ul]








Things to Note

[ul][]CONSTANT updates. At least 1 per day.
[]Full forum integration (ranks, ect.)
[]Completely lag free.
[]Finest fibre-optic lines in the United States.
[*]Full highscores updated every 3 minutes.[/ul]

World-Class Hosting
When we say world-class, we mean it. InnovationX is hosted off a dedicated physical server located in St. Louis, USA. St. Louis USA contains the most powerful internet infrastructure in the United States. We are proud to say we buy from Serverloft Dedicated Server Solutions.
[spoiler=Dedicated Server Specifications] * Fujitsu PRIMERGY RX200 with Intel D2786 Chipset
* 2x Xeon E5520, 2x Quadcore (8 core) - Nehalem
* 8 GB DDR3 DIMM-RAM
* 2x 500 GB SATA II HDDs, 7.200rpm
* RAID 1
* 10.000 GB data transfer
* Server location in Atlanta, Georgia/USA
[/spoiler]

Live Radio DJ
We are now offering our own live radio stream with a professional DJ - Evan. We plays various genres that include rap, hip hop, rock, pop, electric, metal, jazz, and sometimes we play funny commercials like the WTF Blanket!?! commercial.

Live Support System
When we say live support, we mean it. InnovationX has selected trusted members of the community to serve as Live Support Operators. We always have 3 Live Support Operators online. Each Live Support Operator has been chosen according to their time-zone and languages spoken. For example, when it is 3:00 AM in the United States, there will be Australian and Asian Live Support Operators online, as across the earth it is 3:00 PM and many will need support. MOST of our Live Support Operators are fluent in more than 1 language, in fact some are so well, they speak 4 different languages! We currently use LiveZilla FREE for our Live Support system.

Dedication To It’s Best
InnovationX is dedicated to serving customers, such as you. We want you to experience a new type of private server, one in which is a democracy. We don’t do things without asking your opinion of it first. Nearly all of our updates have fair-polls that are open to the public. People can vote whether or not the update would enhance InnovationX. ALL of our staff members are voted on by current staff members, keeping staff quality upright.

The Forums
Here at InnovationX, we hate illegal affairs. Our vBulletin forums are PAID as well as our themes.

Here’s a few facts:
[spoiler=Show Facts]1) You cannot use any version of the software without a license.
2) You void all your warranty and support by using ANY version of the software other than the one you obtained via members area here.
3) You void all your warranty and support by editing the version of the software you downloaded via members area.
4) Nulled version have a lot of known security issues which I will not outline. By using them (which is illegal in 99% of the case), you open your forum, and everything associated with it up to hackers and malicious users.
5) Your host may close your account (this applies to dedicated/colocated servers in datacenters) when they notice you are housing illegal software using their bandwidth, even if you are rightfully licensed.
6) Jelsoft can, have been, and always will take appropriate legal actions against those using vBulletin illegally.[/spoiler]

Our forums are ACTIVE. Unlike other server’s forums, when you post something, expect it to be answered in a few minutes, not a few weeks. Here at InnovationX we are proud to have one of the most active forums in RSPS.

[COLOR=Cyan]Premium Membership[/COLOR]

Premium Membership costs only $5.50 and it will help the server greatly. It is a one-time payment and will never have to pay again. Here is what you get:

Server Benefits:

[ul][]Fishing and Cooking skills
[]Ability to wear 3rd age armor
[]Ability to wear Bandos armor
[]1.5x more than the normal experience of a player
[]2x the pest control points of a normal player
[].25x the zombie points as a normal player
[]Indian Chief Pet which cures you of poison
[]Pet Dragon which heals you
[]Personal banker to follow you around and you can access your bank through him
[]2x the chance to get a christmas cracker than a normal player
[]In-game premium sign
[]Premium Only Zone!
[]::explockon (You will no longer gain experience)
[]::explockoff (You will gain experience again)[/ul]

Forum Benefits:

[ul][]Special colored name
[]Exclusive premium+ forum
[]Higher quality support
[]Monthly name changes[/ul]

[COLOR=DarkOrchid]Extreme Membership
[/COLOR]
For those of you who want a bigger edge on the other players, you can purchase Extreme Membership for, the same as before, a one-time payment of $12.50. This will go a long way in helping us pay for our servers and add new content. Here is what you get. Remember, this is on top of everything premiums get (you get everything above, plus what is below):

Server Benefits:

[ul][]4x the chance to get a Christmas cracker drop from the Sea Troll Queen or King Black Dragon
[]4x the pest control points as a normal member
[].5x the zombie points of a normal player
[]2x the experience gained from every skill than normal members
[]Access to using the Skeleton Mage Pet to help you train and kill NPC’s
[]Different in-game premium sign[/ul]

Forum Benefits:

[ul][]Exclusive purple colored name
[]Bi-weekly name changes[/ul]


Skills - We have them all!


Read full topic
